entry.value: Document the selected code thoroughly, capturing its purpose, inputs, outputs, side effects, and key logic with clear, concise, and maintainable annotations that aid understanding and future maintenance.
Explain the selected code by elucidating its purpose, logic, and key components with clarity and precision, revealing both high-level intent and low-level behavior.

entry.key: Find problems in the selected code
entry.value: Identify bugs, flaws, and quality issues in the selected code with precision and actionable insight.
Refactor the selected code for improved clarity, efficiency, and maintainability, preserving functionality while enhancing structure and readability.

entry.key: Validate Code for Sonar or Linting Issues
entry.value: Validate Code for Sonar or Linting Issues

entry.key: Write E2E Tests for Selected Code
entry.value: Write end-to-end tests for the code using {testingLibraryOptions} testing library and based on the provided code if needed please utilize additional supporting libraries from {additionalLibraries} to provide end-to-end test cases for the code.

entry.key: Write Unit Tests for Selected Code
entry.value: Write unit tests for the code using {testingLibraryOptions} testing library and based on the provided code if needed please utilize additional supporting libraries from {additionalLibraries} to provide unit test cases for the code.
